name: agnoster

name: alias-tips

author: Uwe Dauernheim <http://djui.io>

name: alien-minimal
description: A minimal zsh theme
author: Indrajit <https://eendroroy.github.io>

name: almostontop
description: Clears previous command output every time before new command executed in shell
author: Sergey Valiev <https://github.com/Valiev>

name: ansiweather
description: Weather in your terminal, with ANSI colors and Unicode symbols
author: Frederic Cambus <http://www.cambus.net>

name: archive
description: Provides functions to list and extract archives.
author: Sorin Ionescu <https://github.com/sorin-ionescu>

name: async
description: Because your terminal should be able to perform tasks asynchronously without external tools!
author: Mathias Fredriksson <https://twitter.com/mafredri>

name: autopair
description: A simple plugin that auto-closes, deletes and skips over matching delimiters in zsh intelligently.

name: autosuggestions
description: Fish-like autosuggestions for zsh
author: zsh-users <https://github.com/zsh-users

name: cdbk
description: A ZSH plugin to allow easy named directory creation - shortcuts to any directory you want
author: Mike Dacre <https://github.com/MikeDacre>

name: color
description: A small zsh script for colorising strings
author: James Dinsdale <https://github.com/molovo>

name: command-not-found
description: Displays installation information for not found commands by loading the command-not-found tool.
author: Joseph Booker <https://github.com/sargas>

name: completions
description: Additional completion definitions for Zsh.
author: zsh-users <https://github.com/zsh-users>

name: crash
description: Proper error handling, exceptions and try/catch for ZSH
author: James Dinsdale <https://github.com/molovo>

name: crystal
description: Plugin for crystal
author: Vitalii Elenhaupt <http://veelenga.com>

name: directory
description: Sets directory options and defines directory aliases.

name: dnf
description: Defines dnf aliases.
author: Sorin Ionescu <https://github.com/sorin-ionescu>

name: docker
description: Aliases and functions for docker

name: done
description: Sends a notification when a long running command completes

name: dpkg
description: Defines dpkg aliases.
author: Daniel Bolton <https://github.com/dbb> Benjamin Boudreau <https://github.com/dreur> Sorin Ionescu <https://github.com/sorin-ionescu>

name: dwim
description: A ZSH plugin that attempts to predict what you will want to do next.
author: Pat Regan <http://blog.patshead.com>

name: enhancd
description: A next-generation cd command with an interactive filter
author: BABAROT <b4b4r07@gmail.com>

name: fasd
description: Command-line productivity booster, offers quick access to files and directories.
author: Wei Dai <http://wdai.us/>

name: fast-syntax-highlighting
description: Optimized and extended zsh-syntax-highlighting
author: Zdharma Initiative <http://zdharma.org>

name: filthy
description: A disgustingly clean ZSH prompt theme
author: James Dinsdale <https://github.com/molovo>

name: fzf
description: A plugin which sets up keybindings for fzf
author: James Dinsdale <https://molovo.co>

collision_warnings.history-search-multi-word: The fzf and history-search-multi-word packages both define the same CTRL-R keybinding

name: fzf-git
description: A plugin which sets up git keybindings for fzf
author: James Dinsdale <https://molovo.co>

name: fzf-marks
description: Little script to create, navigate and delete bookmarks in Bash and Zsh, using the fuzzy finder fzf
author: Urbain Vaes <http://urbainvaes.com/git>

name: fzf-z
description: Plugin for zsh to integrate fzf and zsh's z plugin - enables easy switching between recent dirs in zsh
author: Andrew Ferrier <https://github.com/andrewferrier>

name: git
description: A selection of handy git aliases
author: James Dinsdale <https://molovo.co>

name: gitignore
description: ZSH plugin for creating .gitignore files
author: Oleg Voronkovich <http://popartdesign.ru>

name: gitio
description: A zsh plugin for generating a GitHub short URL using git.io
author: Denys Dovhan <http://www.denysdovhan.com>

name: gnu-utility
description: Provides for the interactive use of GNU utilities on BSD systems.
author: Sorin Ionescu <https://github.com/sorin-ionescu>

name: history-search-multi-word
description: Multi-word, syntax highlighted history searching for Zsh
author: Zdharma Initiative <http://zdharma.org>

collision_warnings.fzf: The history-search-multi-word and fzf packages both define the same CTRL-R keybinding

name: history-substring-search
description: ZSH port of Fish shell's history search feature.

name: history-sync
description: plugin for synced zsh_history; with encryption

name: homebrew
description: Aliases and functions for homebrew
author: rolling-space <https://github.com/rolling-space

name: insert-sudo
description: A little zsh snippet to prepend sudo to the current command
author: James Dinsdale <https://github.com/molovo>

name: k
description: k is the new l, yo
author: George Cravtree

name: load-graph
description: Outputs the current 1-minute load average as a percentage, and a spark line graph of the 1, 5 and 15 minute averages.
author: James Dinsdale <https://github.com/molovo>

name: lumberjack
description: A logging interface for shell scripts
author: James Dinsdale <https://github.com/molovo>

name: node
description: Aliases and functions for node
author: rolling-space <https://github.com/rolling-space

name: nvm-auto-use

name: osx
description: macOS related functions
author: rolling-space <https://github.com/rolling-space

description: The most awesome Powerline theme for ZSH around!
author: Ben Hilburn <https://github.com/bhilburn>

name: pretty-time
description: Convert seconds to a human readable string: 165392 → 1d 21h 56m 32s

name: pure
description: Pretty, minimal and fast ZSH prompt
author: Sindre Sorhus <https://github.com/sindresorhus>

name: snoopy
description: A Zsh theme inspired by ZiM framework's `eriner` theme

name: solarized-man

name: syntax-highlighting
description: Fish shell like syntax highlighting for Zsh
author: zsh-users <https://github.com/zsh-users

name: tipz
description: A small ZSH plugin to help you remember your aliases

name: titles

name: transfer

name: utility
description: Helper functions and aliases
author: rolling-space <https://github.com/rolling-space

name: warhol
description: Colorize command output using grc and lscolors.
author: Joe Block <https://github.com/unixorn>

name: z
description: Tracks your most used directories, based on 'frecency'.
author: rupa <http://un.ix.io>

name: z-cd
description: A wrapper around the cd builtin which searches directory history using z

name: zsh-bd

name: zshbuild

name: zsh-dropbox

name: zulu-theme

author: James Dinsdale <https://github.com/molovo>
